posts.content:
One pattern that made sense for the AI Agent: don't send prompts in API requests. Send keys.

`POST /diagnostics?prompt_id=diagnose` → Registry → Factory → Prompt

Why:
- Prompts evolve without API changes
- No prompt injection risk
- Client code never changes
- Prompt engineers edit markdown, not deployments

Strategy Pattern + Registry = prompts as content, not code.

[network-triage-ai-agent](https://github.com/SpotOnInc/network-triage-ai-agent)
